name: 四(4).
description:
Sometimes, a good hard look in the mirror is all we need. Other times, it might require a little more push.

In 四(4). you play as a character who is stuck in a crossroads of sorts. They obtain help from multiple different versions of themselves, but is it enough?

四(4). is a submission to the Caltrop Core jam and runs using the Caltrop Core system designed by titanomachyRPG. check their stuff out!

Cover Photo by Tuur Tisseghem from Pexels
